scripts.start:dev: npm run build && npm run compile-server && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env development
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run compile-server && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.update:major-version: ts-node package-updater.ts major && npm run push-package-to-git
scripts.update:minor-version: ts-node package-updater.ts minor && npm run push-package-to-git
scripts.update:patch-version: ts-node package-updater.ts patch && npm run push-package-to-git
scripts.push-package-to-git: git commit package.json -m "Updated package.json to #version [skip ci]"
